sentences.en: A bank spokesman was unable to clarify the situation.
sentences.cn: 一位银行发言人未能把情况解释清楚。

sentences.en: An analogy is often used to clarify the mechanism of conduction in a semiconductor.
sentences.cn: 为了弄清半导体中的导电机制,常常采用一种比喻.

sentences.en: An example will help to clarify what I mean.
sentences.cn: 举个例子将有助于澄清我的意思.

sentences.en: Can you clarify this long sentence?
sentences.cn: 你能把这个长句子解释清楚吗？

sentences.en: Examples using the 8250 will be presented in hardware section to clarify full - decoding schemes.
sentences.cn: 在硬件一节中有应用说明全译码方案8250的例子.

sentences.en: I am happy to clarify any points that are still unclear.
sentences.cn: 我愿意说明任何仍然不清楚的地方.

sentences.en: Identifying the target is not enough to clarify the project boundaries.
sentences.cn: 确定目标不足以弄清项目的范围.

sentences.en: It requires of us great efforts to clarify sewage in cities.
sentences.cn: 净化城市的污水需要我们很大的努力.

sentences.en: Reporters asked him to clarify his position (= say exactly what his beliefs are ) on welfare reform.
sentences.cn: 记者们要求他阐明他在福利改革问题上的立场。

sentences.en: The aim of this initial meeting is to clarify the issues.
sentences.cn: 本次初步会议的目标是澄清这些问题。

sentences.en: The CEQ has attempted to clarify both the timing and scope issues.
sentences.cn: 环境质量委员会曾试图理清时机和范围问题.

sentences.en: The last paragraph of your letter under reply is ambiguous. Please clarify.
sentences.cn: 你方来信的最后一段意义不明确, 请澄清.

sentences.en: The Supreme Court's other decision in this area does little to clarify this issue.
sentences.cn: 最高法院在这一领域的其他判决对澄清该问题无能为力.

sentences.en: These brief remarks may serve to clarify the fact.
sentences.cn: 这些简要的评论可以澄清事实.

sentences.en: To clarify some grammatical doubts, the young wrote to H. Fowler, the lexicographer who produced the "Concise English Dictionary".
sentences.cn: 为了探索英语，那年轻人给《简明英语词典》的主编H-Fowler写了封信。

sentences.en: Within information graphics, clarify cause and effect.
sentences.cn: 在信息图形中, 要阐明原因与结果.

words.tran_cn: 阐明（clarify的过去分词形式）；澄清

trans.tran_en: to make something clearer or easier to understand
to make something clearer or easier to understand
